author: Ted Byrne
content: that is the point. I could be gimmick. So could, say, a paint knife to an oil painter. Or awide mouth chisel to a marble sculptor. If the seams show... it is a gimmick. But if they don't it is a tool. Here, you make it a tool. I am not distracted by the effect, rather I am delighted by the image. I had no idea how you did it. I did not care until you told me. Now I care.
